companyaim.description: To build strongest customer parterships through consistent and reliable delivery and be the top revenue making BU within YASH.
Attract and retain outstanding people by creating a culture that fosters openness,innovation, promotes individual growth, rewards initiative and performance thereby delivery best in class services.
J2EE,Mainframe,ECM,Strategy Services,BPM and Integration,Business Intelligence,Portal services,Productivity and QA Services.

knowledge.description: John Deere is the brand name of Deere and Company, an American corporation that manufactures agricultural machinery, heavy equipment, forestry machinery, diesel engines, drivetrains used in heavy equipment, and lawn care equipment.
